title: What is this Nidalee...
body: Hey guys, I haven't really been on League for 3 weeks. But I keep seeing and hearing about this Nidalee issue. I play Nidalee a ton so I would like to know what all this is about? What is the issue with Nidalee?

replies.body: Nid is strong now so you'll be fine :)

Many people can't see her spears when the headhunter skin is equipped. 
Idk, that is the only thing I know about.
I don't know the issue, only she's strong in jungle atm. Sustain from heal, movement speed in jungle for faster clears, spears from fog of war.

Just the first clear sucks ass, ever want to screw over a nidalee?

Invade her late and kill her before level 3, she then has no way to get going because she is really far behind all game.
